title: Is Halo Infinite Getting a Battle Royale? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.02.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about a possible Halo Infinite Battle Royale mode, the next Astro Bot game, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:08 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Xcast is live! The crew gives their impressions on their time with Halo Infinite this last week. You can of course catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.
Part Two of Greg and Tim’s Emily is Away 3 playthrough is up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
A new Kinda Funny Podcast went up this morning titled: We Go For a World Record
https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1422237455630036992
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:05 - Could Halo Infinite be getting BATTLE ROYALE?? - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:24:30 - Team Asobi is making their 'Most Ambitious Game Yet' - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:33:20 - Ad
00:35:30 - Assassin’s Creed Valhalla’s director confirms he’s helming the Dead Space remake - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:43:26 - Former Blizzard Developer and ArenaNet, Undead Labs Founder calls for Unionization - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:51:44 - Kojima Tweets: Fast and Furious depressed Hideo Kojima
00:58:30 - Out today
01:02:15 - Squad Up:Zack(PS5) - ZackIsHot
01:01:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
